## DurablePromise class

A promise that defers execution until it's awaited or .then/.catch/.finally is called

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DurablePromise<T> implements Promise<T>
```

**Implements:** Promise&lt;T&gt;

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

[then(onfulfilled, onrejected)](./durable-execution-sdk-js.durablepromise.then.md)

</td><td>

</td><td>

Attaches callbacks for the resolution and/or rejection of the Promise Triggers execution if not already started
